mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_restaurant (nm, addr, lat, lng, i_user, cd_category) VALUES (#{nm}, #{addr}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{i_user}, #{cd_category})
mapper.select: SELECT A.i_rest, A.nm, A.lat, A.lng, A.addr, A.i_user, A.hits as cntHits , ifnull(B.val, '') as cd_category_nm , C.nm as user_nm , ifnull(D.cnt, 0) as cnt_favorite FROM t_restaurant A LEFT JOIN c_code_d B ON A.cd_category = B.cd AND B.i_m = 1 LEFT JOIN t_user C ON A.i_user = C.i_user LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_rest, COUNT(i_rest) as cnt FROM t_user_favorite WHERE i_rest = #{i_rest} GROUP BY i_rest ) D ON A.i_rest =D.i_rest WHERE A.i_rest = #{i_rest}
